projects.name: Push 2 Prod
projects.description: Push 2 Prod is the modern and easiest way to push any apps into production in one command. It's an ssh based command line interface written in ruby.

projects.name: Blaugue
projects.description:
Blaugue is a blog I made for my family to get memories of holidays and travels !
It's open source and currently being rebuilt...

projects.name: Ondine Portfolio
projects.description: Ondine CAMPONOVO's website is a portfolio for an artist. It has a dashboard page to add creations articles, classed by labels. ⚠️ Currently offline

projects.name: Elevedirect
projects.description: Elevedirect is an open source Ecoledirect client, with a new interface, and news functionalities built by a student for students. ⚠️ Unofficial product !

projects.name: Magoole
projects.description: Magoole is an open source and data privacy focused search engine with its own crawler and website discovering. ⚠️ Experimental !

projects.name: La Plante Qr
projects.description: La Plante Qr is a school project, that sold kit to learn how to garden. By scanning your kit's Qr code, you will access to sheets about your plant. You can also take pictures of it and download a slideshow !

projects.name: Étalans Weather Station
projects.description: A weather station that collect temperature and humidity from a raspberry pi and generate charts and analyses on a website. ⚠️ Currently offline
